edu.berkeley.compbio.sequtils.strings

Class RonPSANode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidsoergel.dsutils.AbstractGenericFactoryAware
      • edu.berkeley.compbio.sequtils.strings.MarkovTreeNode
        • edu.berkeley.compbio.sequtils.strings.RonPSANode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.davidsoergel.dsutils.GenericFactoryAware, com.davidsoergel.dsutils.Labellable<String>, com.davidsoergel.stats.MutableDistribution, edu.berkeley.compbio.ml.cluster.AdditiveClusterable<MarkovTreeNode>, edu.berkeley.compbio.ml.cluster.Clusterable<MarkovTreeNode>, SequenceSpectrum<MarkovTreeNode>, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RonPSA

    public class RonPSANode
extends MarkovTreeNode
    Extends a MarkovTreeNode with backlinks, for making make a Probabilistic Suffix Automaton (PSA).
    Version:
    $Id: RonPSANode.java 442 2009-06-15 17:53:56Z soergel $
    Author:
    David Soergel

      • setBackoffPrior

        public void setBackoffPrior(RonPSANode backoffPrior)
        This method assumes that it has not been run before, and that all nodes at higher levels in the tree have already been proceesed. So it must be run in breadth-first order exactly once.
        Parameters:
        backoffPrior -
